channel.title: Saradomin sword spec. easy fix @@@

item.title: Saradomin sword spec. easy fix @@@
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

ok , so any time i spec with this sword the hit is ALWAYS 0/* , with the second hit , i hit 1-35 , with the first one i ALWAYS hit 0. how can i make it so both hits would be / ??

this is the first code that i have for it. any kind of help would be appreciate it. thx in advance.

} if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8100 && specialAmount > 99){ specialAtk(true, 100, 600, 811); AttackingOn2.specGFX(732); frame174(299, 000, 030); getHit(5); usingSpecial = true;

and this is the second code

} if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8100 && specialAmount > 99){ specialAtkNPC(true, 100, -1, 2720); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(20) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); stillgfx(732, EnemyY, EnemyX, 0,0); }

Read full topic
